pkgmetadata.longdescription: # GoPro SynchronizerTired of *GoPro Cloud* not working? Did you miss the old **GoPro software** to sync videos? This tool is what you're searching for (if you're a sheel enjoyer) ## InstallationThe tool can be downloaded directly from [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/gopro-sync/).```bashpip install gopro-sync```## UsageYou can see the help, `-h`, man to know all the possibile commands.```bashgopro-sync -h```
